get.summary: Get details of a custom button
get.description: This API is used to fetch details of a custom button.

delete.description: This API is used to delete a custom button.

patch.description: This API is used to update the details associated with a custom button.

get.description: This API fetches custom buttons that are accessible by a particular user.

post.description: This API is used to execute the action associated with a custom button that was configured during its creation.

get.description: This API is used to fetch a list of custom buttons and their corresponding details.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Fetches the profiles, department, actor and layout details of the custom button. The allowed values are: @profiles@, @department@, @actor@ and @layouts@

schema.description: Fetches the profiles, department, actor and layout details of the custom button. The allowed values are: @profiles@, @department@, @actor@ and @layouts@

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of custom buttons that need to be fetched.

schema.description: The number of custom buttons that need to be fetched.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the custom button.

schema.description: The name of the custom button.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The starting index number from which the custom buttons should be fetched.

schema.description: The starting index number from which the custom buttons should be fetched.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location of the custom button on the desk.

schema.description: The location of the custom button on the desk.

parameters.name: layoutId
parameters.description: IDs of Layouts for which the custom buttons should be fetched.

schema.description: IDs of Layouts for which the custom buttons should be fetched.

parameters.name: isEnable
parameters.description: Fetches enabled custom buttons for a specified location, if location is provided. If the location is not provided, the key fetches all the enabled custom buttons regardless of the location.

schema.description: Fetches enabled custom buttons for a specified location, if location is provided. If the location is not provided, the key fetches all the enabled custom buttons regardless of the location.

post.description: This API is used to create a custom button.

module.description: API name of the module to which the custom button belongs.

departmentId.description: The ID of the department to which the custom button belongs.

location.description: The location of the custom button on the desk.

visibilityType.description: The visibility of custom button in the Layouts. The allowed values are @NO_LAYOUT@,@SPECIFIC_LAYOUT@ and @ALL_LAYOUT@

isEnable.description: Specifies whether the visibility of the custom button for the particular location should be enabled or disabled.

x-custom-parameters-attributes.descrption: The location of the custom button on the desk.

encodeType.description: The encoding type to encode the provided data. The allowed values are @UTF_8@, @UTF_16@, @ISO_8859_1@, @ISO_8859_9@, @GB2312@, @BIG_5@, @SHIFT_JIS@

type.description: Action execution type. Allowed values are @INVOKE_URL@, @CUSTOM_FUNCTION@

openType.description: Indicates where the provided action link should be opened. The allowed values are @NEW_TAB@, @NEW_WINDOW@ and @SAME_TAB@

entityId.description: IDs of entities that are associated with the custom button
